attributes.review: This app is not good AT ALL. I do not recommend I get scared every time I open it bc I’m greeted by this horrific orange monster kind of looks like a Cheeto puff with pasta on the top. This app promotes a man who is racist,homophobic, rapist and a narcissist horrible do NOT download
attributes.title: Do not get this app it deserves to be taken off App Store

attributes.review: i am very sad to say, the Cheeto Man app did NOT turn me into a Cheeto💔 I had downloaded it in hope for this to happen, but instead it gave my phone the enchanted “Cheeto Man Virus” 😪 If you download this app in hopes of turning into a cheeto, i’m sorry to disappoint 💔
attributes.title: Honestly, very disappointed 😪💔

attributes.review: When I open this app I was expecting to see a true leader. That has respect, fights for justice, and equality. Instead I saw the most orange looking man that gives no true justice  to his country. And is a convicted child rapist, nah, that ain’t my president and he never will be. 🧚🏻🌈✨
attributes.title: Nah, just no

attributes.review: I came to this app expecting a lot but I just witnessed quite possibly the worst app ever created. nothing works and the lay out makes absolutely zero sense. Plus as soon as I opened the app I got flashed but a giant penis. Is this his idea of a joke?? Not funny. MY CHILD SAW THAT!
attributes.title: I am disgusted

attributes.review: This is honestly one of he worst apps I could’ve ever downloaded. If I could give it zero stars I would. Everything about this is disgusting and just so wrong. Just knowing that I downloaded this app is so embarrassing I will be deleting it now ✌️🚪🏃🏾‍♀️
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!!!

attributes.review: i open the app because i wanted to support my orange cheeto dust president. however, upon opening the app somehow they detected that i am a person of color and FARTED IN MY FACE. keep in mind that this was at 11 am and it is now 8pm and the absolutely putrid smell is STILL looming in my house! DO NOT GET THIS APP IT WILL FART IN YOUR FACE IF YOU ARE NOT WHITE!!!!!!!
attributes.title: stinky

attributes.title: WORST THING EVER !🤮🤢👎
